channel.title: R on Abbey Haymond
channel.description: Recent content in R on Abbey Haymond

item.title: Even when they lose, the Patriots look like Super Bowl champions
item.description: The Patriots have been a powerhouse in the NFL for the past two decades. They have won six Super Bowl titles, and they looked like a team that was ready to claim another one during their 2017 season. Tom Brady had the most passing yards in a Super Bowl in 2018, so why was that not enough to lead his team to a victory? I took a look at their numbers on offense during the Super Bowl.
